sections.heading: insurer; qualifications.Any person in whose name more than twenty-five motor vehicles are registered may qualify as a self-insurer by obtaining a certificate of self-insurance issued by the department, as provided in section 60-563

sections.text:
60-562.Self-insurer; qualifications.

Any person in whose name more than twenty-five motor vehicles are registered may qualify as a self-insurer by obtaining a certificate of self-insurance issued by the department, as provided in section 60-563.

SourceLaws 1949, c. 178, ยง 62, p. 503.
